00061     function tx_init() {
00062         $this->extConf = unserialize($GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['EXT']['extConf']['servicemgr']);
00063 
00064         $this->generalConf = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_tsparser_ext');
00065         $this->generalConf->tt_track = 0;
00066         $this->generalConf->init();
00067         $sys_page = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_pageSelect');
00068         $rootLine = $sys_page->getRootLine($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00069         $this->generalConf->runThroughTemplates($rootLine);
00070         $this->generalConf->generateConfig();
00071         $this->generalConf = $this->generalConf->setup['plugin.']['tx_servicemgr.'];
00072 
00073         $this->template = $this->generalConf['TemplateFile'];
00074         if (!$this->template) {
00075             $this->template = 'EXT:servicemgr/res/tables.tmpl';
00076         }
00077         $this->template = $this->cObj->fileResource($this->template);
00078 
00079         $this->pi_initPIflexForm();
00080 
00081         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['tx_servicemgr_css'] = ' <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="'.t3lib_extMgm::siteRelPath(servicemgr).'res/tables.css" />';
00082         return true;
00083     }

00094     function fetchConfigValue($param) {
00095         if (strchr($param, '.')) {
00096             list($section, $param) = explode('.', $param, 2);
00097         }
00098         $value = trim($this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], $param, ($section ? 's' . ucfirst($section) : 'sDEF')));
00099         if (!is_null($value) && $value != '') {
00100             if ($section) {
00101                 $this->conf[$section . '.'][$param] = $value;
00102             }
00103             else {
00104                 $this->conf[$param] = $value;
00105             }
00106         }
00107     }

00114     function tx_loadLL() {
00115 
00116         if ($this->LOCAL_LANG_loaded !== 1) {
00117             $this->pi_loadLL();
00118         }
00119 
00120         //locallang_common.xml is in extension basepath
00121         $basePath = t3lib_extMgm::extPath($this->extKey).'locallang_common.xml';
00122 
00123         //load locallang_common.xml
00124         $tempLOCAL_LANG = t3lib_div::readLLfile($basePath,$this->LLkey,$GLOBALS['TSFE']->renderCharset);
00125 
00126         //locallang_common.xml and locallang.xml get merged
00127         //locallang.xml overwrites locallang_common.xml
00128         $oldLL = $this->LOCAL_LANG;
00129         if (is_array($tempLOCAL_LANG)) {
00130             reset($tempLOCAL_LANG);
00131             while(list($k,$lA)=each($tempLOCAL_LANG)) {
00132                 if (is_array($lA))  {
00133                     foreach($lA as $llK => $llV)    {
00134                         if (!is_array($llV))    {
00135                             if ($oldLL[$k][$llK] == NULL) {
00136                                 $oldLL[$k][$llK] = $llV;
00137                             }
00138                         }
00139                     }
00140                 }
00141             }
00142         }
00143         $this->LOCAL_LANG = $oldLL;
00144 
00145         //set flag
00146         $this->LOCAL_LANG_COMMON_loaded = 1;
00147     }

00156     function getTeamMembers($teamUID, $fillName=true) {
00157         //get alle fe_users from database
00158         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00159             'uid, username, name, first_name, last_name, usergroup',   #select
00160             'fe_users', #from
00161             'usergroup<>\'\' AND deleted=0'  #where
00162         );
00163 
00164         // dump arrays
00165         $returnValue = array();
00166 
00167         if ($res) {
00168             while ($row=$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00169 
00170                 //fillName
00171                 if ($fillName && $row['name'] == '') {
00172                     $row['name'] = $row['username'];
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 // fill return value with all users being part of team with uid = $teamUID
00176                 if (in_array($teamUID, split(',', $row['usergroup']))) {
00177                     $returnValue[$row['uid']] = $row;
00178                 }
00179             }
00180         }
00181 
00182         //if there is a result -> return
00183         if (count($returnValue) !== 0) {
00184             return $returnValue;
00185         } else {
00186             return false;
00187         }
00188     }

00196     function getTags() {
00197         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00198             'uid, name, parrent',   #select
00199             'tx_servicemgr_tags', #from
00200             'hidden=0 AND deleted=0'  #where
00201         );
00202 
00203 
00204         $returnValue = array();
00205         if ($res) {
00206             while ($row=$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00207                 $returnValue[$row['uid']] = $row;
00208             }
00209         }
00210 
00211         //if there is a result -> return
00212         if (count($returnValue) !== 0) {
00213             return $returnValue;
00214         } else {
00215             return false;
00216         }
00217     }

00225     function getSingleEvent($eventId) {
00226         $resEvent = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00227             'uid, datetime, subject, public, series, tags, requiredteams, documents, notes',   #select
00228             'tx_servicemgr_events', #from
00229             'uid='.$eventId.' and hidden=0 and deleted=0',  #where
00230             '', '',
00231             '0,1' #limit
00232         );
00233 
00234         if ($resEvent) {
00235             return $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($resEvent);
00236         } else {
00237             return false;
00238         }
00239     }

00247     function getSeries($uid = '') {
00248         $where = 'hidden=0 AND deleted=0';
00249         if (!empty($uid)) {
00250             $where .= ' AND uid='.intval($uid);
00251         }
00252         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00253             'uid, name',   #select
00254             'tx_servicemgr_series', #from
00255             $where  #where
00256         );
00257 
00258         // dump arrays
00259         $returnValue = array();
00260 
00261         if ($res) {
00262         while ($row=$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00263 
00264                 // fill return value with tags
00265                 $returnValue[$row['uid']] = $row;
00266             }
00267         }
00268 
00269         //if there is a result -> return
00270         if (count($returnValue) !== 0) {
00271             return $returnValue;
00272         } else {
00273             return false;
00274         }
00275     }

00283     function getSingleSchedule($eventId) {
00284         $resSchedule = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00285             'uid, event, duty', #select
00286             'tx_servicemgr_dutyschedule', #from
00287             'event='.$eventId.' and hidden=0 and deleted=0' #where
00288         );
00289 
00290         if ($resSchedule) {
00291             $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($resSchedule);
00292             if (unserialize($row['duty']) == false) {
00293                 return array();
00294             } else {
00295                 return unserialize($row['duty']);
00296             }
00297         } else {
00298             return false;
00299         }
00300     }

00309     function getAudioFiles($eventId) {
00310         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00311             'uid, event, title, file, filedate, playtime, filesize, bitrate, album',   #select
00312             'tx_servicemgr_sermons', #from
00313             'event='.$eventId.' and hidden=0 and deleted=0'  #where
00314         );
00315 
00316         $resultVar = array();
00317         if ($res) {
00318             while ($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00319                 $resultVar[] = $row;
00320             }
00321             return $resultVar;
00322         } else {
00323             return false;
00324         }
00325     }

00333     function getAudiosPerEvent($eventId) {

00343     function detailViewEvent($eventId, $config, $template) {
00344         $row = $this->getSingleEvent(intval($eventId));
00345 
00346         $subparts = array(
00347             'subject' => $this->cObj->getSubpart($template, '###SP_SUBJECT###'),
00348             'datetime' => $this->cObj->getSubpart($template, '###SP_DATETIME###'),
00349             'series' => $this->cObj->getSubpart($template, '###SP_SERIES###'),
00350             'tags' => $this->cObj->getSubpart($template, '###SP_TAGS###'),
00351             'notes' => $this->cObj->getSubpart($template, '###SP_NOTES###'),
00352             'sermon' => $this->cObj->getSubpart($template, '###SP_SERMON###'),
00353             'backlink' => $this->cObj->getSubpart($template, '###SP_BACKLINK###'),
00354         );
00355 
00356         $subpartContent = array();
00357 
00358         if (in_array('subject',$config['subparts']) && !empty($row['subject'])) {
00359             $subpartContent['###SP_SUBJECT###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarker($subparts['subject'], '###SUBJECT###', $row['subject']);
00360         } else {
00361             $subpartContent['###SP_SUBJECT###'] = '';
00362         }
00363 
00364         if (in_array('datetime',$config['subparts']) && !empty($row['datetime'])) {
00365             $subpartContent['###SP_DATETIME###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray(
00366                 $subparts['datetime'],
00367                 array(
00368                     '###DATE###' => date('d.m.Y', $row['datetime']),
00369                     '###TIME###' => date('H:i', $row['datetime']),
00370                 )
00371             );
00372         } else {
00373             $subpartContent['###SP_DATETIME###'] = '';
00374         }
00375 
00376         if (in_array('series',$config['subparts']) && !empty($row['series'])) {
00377             $series = $this->getSeries($row['series']);
00378             $subpartContent['###SP_SERIES###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray(
00379                 $subparts['series'],
00380                 array(
00381                     '###L_SERIES###' => $this->pi_getLL('series'),
00382                     '###SERIES###' => $series[$row['series']]['name'],
00383                 )
00384             );
00385         } else {
00386             $subpartContent['###SP_SERIES###'] = '';
00387         }
00388 
00389         if (in_array('tags',$config['subparts']) && !empty($row['tags'])) {
00390             $subpartContent['###SP_TAGS###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray(
00391                 $subparts['tags'],
00392                 array(
00393                     '###L_TAGS###' => $this->pi_getLL('tags'),
00394                     '###TAGS###' => $tags,
00395                 )
00396             );
00397         } else {
00398             $subpartContent['###SP_TAGS###'] = '';
00399         }
00400 
00401         if (in_array('notes', $config['subparts']) && !empty($row['notes'])) {
00402             $subpartContent['###SP_NOTES###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarker($subparts['notes'], '###NOTES###', $row['notes']);
00403         } else {
00404             $subpartContent['###SP_NOTES###'] = '';
00405         }
00406 
00407         if (in_array('sermon',$config['subparts'])) {
00408 
00409             if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('audioplayer')) {
00410                 require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('audioplayer').'class.tx_audioplayer.php');
00411                 $audioplayer = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_audioplayer');
00412                 $audioplayer->init();
00413                 $audioplayer->setOptions(array('initialvolume'=>'100','animation'=>'no'));
00414             } else {
00415                 $player = '';
00416             }
00417 
00418             $audioFiles = $this->getAudioFiles($eventId);
00419             $allPreachers = $this->getTeamMembers($this->generalConf['PreacherTeamUID']);
00420             $duty = $this->getSingleSchedule($eventId);
00421             $preacher = $duty[$this->generalConf['PreacherTeamUID']];
00422             if (is_array($preacher)) {
00423                 $outPreacher = '';
00424                 foreach($allPreachers as $singlePreacher) {
00425                     if (in_array($singlePreacher['uid'], $preacher)) {
00426                         $outPreacher .= $this->pi_linkToPage(
00427                             $singlePreacher['name'],
00428                             $this->generalConf['preacherdetailPID'],'',
00429                             array('tx_feuser_pi2[showUid]'=>$singlePreacher['uid'])
00430                         );
00431                     }
00432                 }
00433             }
00434 
00435             $subpartContent['###SP_SERMON###'] = '';
00436             foreach ($audioFiles as $audioFile) {
00437                 $subpartContent['###SP_SERMON###'] .= $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray(
00438                     $subparts['sermon'],
00439                     array(
00440                         '###PREACHER###' => $outPreacher,
00441                         '###SUBJECT###' => $audioFile['title'],
00442                         '###PLAYER###' => $audioplayer ? $audioplayer->getFlashPlayer($audioFile['file'], $audioFile['uid']) : '',
00443                     )
00444                 );
00445             }
00446 
00447         } else {
00448             $subpartContent['###SP_SERMON###'] = '';
00449         }
00450 
00451         if (in_array('notes', $config['subparts']) && !empty($row['notes'])) {
00452             $subpartContent['###SP_NOTES###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarker($subparts['notes'], '###NOTES###', $row['notes']);
00453         } else {
00454             $subpartContent['###SP_NOTES###'] = '';
00455         }
00456 
00457         if (in_array('backlink',$config['subparts']) && !empty($config['backlink'])) {
00458             $subpartContent['###SP_BACKLINK###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarker(
00459                 $subparts['backlink'],
00460                 '###BACKLINK###',
00461                 $this->pi_linkToPage($config['backlink']['str'],$config['backlink']['id'])
00462             );
00463         } else {
00464             $subpartContent['###SP_BACKLINK###'] = '';
00465         }
00466 
00467         $content = $this->substituteMarkersAndSubparts($template,array(),$subpartContent);
00468 
00469         return $content;
00470 
00471 
00472     }

00480     function fileExtension($filename){
00481         $parts = split('\.', $filename);
00482         $parts = array_reverse($parts, false);
00483         return $parts[0];
00484     }

00492     function throwErrorMsg($msg) {
00493         return '<div class="tx_servicemgr_errormsg">'.$msg.'</div>';
00494     }

00504     function tx_linkToPage($str, $id, $urlParameter) {
00505         $additionalParams = '';
00506         foreach ($urlParameter as $key => $value) {
00507             $additionalParams .= '&'.$key.'='.$value;
00508         }
00509         $content = $this->cObj->typoLink(
00510             $str,
00511             array (
00512                 'parameter' => $id,
00513                 'useCacheHash'=>1,
00514                 'additionalParams'=>$additionalParams,
00515             )
00516         );
00517         return $content;
00518     }
00519 
00532     function substituteMarkersAndSubparts($template, array $markers, array $subparts) {
00533         $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template, $markers);
00534         if (count($subparts) > 0) {
00535             foreach ($subparts as $name => $subpart) {
00536                 $content = $this->cObj->substituteSubpart($content, $name, $subpart);
00537             }
00538         }
00539         return $content;
00540     }
